snippet: The crusade to sign up Americans is getting all the attention. But behind the scenes, investors are seeing dollar signs.
abstract: Adam Davidson article notes while the crusade to sign up Americans to the Affordable Care Act is getting all the attention, behind the scenes many investors are seeing opportunities to make money; cites NaviHealth, company designed to streamline post-acute care for patients recovering from surgery or illness, which could be first of many billion-dollar companies built around Obama's health care law.
lead_paragraph: The crusade to sign up Americans is getting all the attention. But behind the scenes, investors are seeing dollar signs.

headline.main: The President Wants You to Get Rich on Obamacare

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
